title: Isak not in Newcastle squad for pre-season tour
summary: Newcastle leave striker Alexander Isak out of their squad for the pre-season tour of Asia as speculation over his future grows.

title: Spain players deserve to enjoy Euro 2025 final - Walsh
summary: England midfielder Keira Walsh hopes opponents Spain can "enjoy" playing in the Euro 2025 final without the "controversy" that surrounded the World Cup.
